name: Vikings VS Waves
description:
Vikings Vs Waves is a vibrant and addictive infinite jumping/running game.
Take control over the viking ship with one-tap controls and set sail to conquer the realms one by one. Use the gravity to make the ship jump from wave to wave, while collecting boosts and coins along the way. Use these boosts to go faster, because fast you must go if you want to keep the midgard serpent away from your ship. Go too slow and the serpent will catch up with you!

Fun & Easy Gameplay:
- With the 'one-tap' gameplay you have a game that is easy to learn, but hard to master.

Awesome realms & unique soundtrack:
- Complete achievements and unlock new and amazing realms!
- Each realm comes with a unique soundtrack.

Lots of achievements:
- There are lots of achievements to earn.

It's free:
- Vikings Vs Waves is completely free to download and contains no ads. If you want to support us as developers you can purchase purely cosmetic items from the in-game shop.

For Anyone:
- Our viking game can be played by kids, teens and adults. It is fun for the entire family!

So what are you waiting for? Download Vikings Vs Waves today and see how far you're able to go before the midgard serpent devours you whole!
